pullrequest.title: Fix mouse picking for cases where visuals overlap with the laser

content.raw: It's nice to have this fixed. I had noticed a similar problem with the moment of inertia visualization I've been testing (#203), where large MOI visuals would prevent you from selecting objects underneath. I tested by merging this branch with issue_203 and it fixes the problem there too.
